sentences.sContent: Cholesterol, a type of lipid, is found in foods from animal sources.
sentences.sContent_eng: Cholesterol, a type of lipid, is found in foods from animal sources.
sentences.sCn: 胆固醇也是一种油脂，存在于动物来源的食物中。

sentences.sContent: The virus also increases lipid sensitivity and decreases leptin secretion of the new fat cells.
sentences.sContent_eng: The virus also increases lipid sensitivity and decreases leptin secretion of the new fat cells.
sentences.sCn: 该病毒还会增加新脂肪细胞的脂肪灵敏度，并降低其瘦素分泌。

sentences.sContent: Discard the yolk or a portion of it if you're trying to lower your fat intake, as the yolk is almost 100% lipid.
sentences.sContent_eng: Discard the yolk or a portion of it if you're trying to lower your fat intake, as the yolk is almost 100% lipid.
sentences.sCn: 如果你试图降低你的脂肪摄入，可以去掉整个蛋黄或者部份蛋黄，因为蛋黄几乎是 100% 的脂质。

phrases.pCn: 脂质过氧化；脂质过氧化作用；脂质过氧化反应
类脂物代谢作用；类脂化合物代谢作用

trans.tranOther: one of several types of fattysubstances in living things, such as fat, oil, or wax
